com.qtplaf.library.app

Class Argument

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.app.Argument

  • public class Argument
extends java.lang.Object
    Startup or command line argument to help the management, i.e. validation and reading in any order, of the main arguments. The arguments must have the standard operating system format passed as the args parameter in the main. Examples of arguments are, the slash is optional:
    • /arg_name
    • /arg_name:value
    • /arg_name:"value with spaces"
    • /arg_name:value_1+value_2+...+value_n
    Argumens are not case sensitive.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
